SELECT A.BOOK_NO AS BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME AS BOOK_NAME, A.BOOK_AUTHOR AS BOOK_AUTHOR, A.BOOK_PUBLISHER AS BOOK_PUBLISHER, A.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBER_NO, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(A.BOOK_RETURNDATE, INTERVAL 9 HOUR), '%Y-%m-%d') AS BOOK_RETURNDATE, B.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME FROM BOOK A INNER JOIN FILE B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK SET MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}, BOOK_LOANDATE = NOW(), BOOK_RETURNDATE = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY), BOOK_RESERVE = NULL WHERE BOOK_NO = #{book_no}
